page.title: 03Timber around Brockhampton
page.content: {Tree Uses {OAK} furniture,posts,beams {BEECH}butt furniture,mining_timber {SWEET-CHESTNUT}timber,cleft_fencing {RIPPLE-SYCAMORE}butt veneers_furniture {YEW} furniture {HORNBEAM} furniture {WALNUT} figuring_furniture {BIRCH} pulp_wood for paper {LIME} picture_frames,tool handles {CEDAR} furniture,gates,sheds {SPORTS-ASH}tennis-racket,tool-handles {LARCH} gates,stakes,rails {NORWAY-SPRUCE}stakes,rails {DOUGLAS-FIR}stakes,rails The tree felling is very mechanised trees are felled with chain_saws,trac_ tors drag out the timber,grabs are used for lifting and unloading trees,Hy_habs mounted on the lorrys, enable them to be easily loaded.
